original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Abhejjavagga
analyzed: a bhejja vagga

original: 1. Khuddānukhuddakapañha
analyzed: khudda anukhuddaka pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘abhiññāyāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi no anabhiññāyā’ti.
analyzed: abhiññāya aha bhikkhave dhammam desemi no an abhiññāya ati

original: Puna ca vinayapaññattiyā evaṁ bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: puna ca vinaya paññattiyā evam bhaṇita

original: ‘ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti.
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānaḥ ānanda saṅghaḥ mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatu uti

original: Kiṁ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni duppaññattāni, udāhu
analyzed: kim nu kho bhante nāgasena khudda anukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni duppaññattāni udāhu

original: avatthusmiṁ ajānitvā paññattāni, yaṁ bhagavā attano accayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanāpeti?
analyzed: avatthusmim a jānitvā paññattāni yam bhagavā attanaḥ accayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanāpeti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘abhiññāyāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi no anabhiññāyā’ti, tena hi ‘ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: abhiññāya āha bhikkhave dhammam desemi no an abhiññāya ati tena hi ākaṅkhamānaḥ ānanda saṅghaḥ mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni yam tam micchā

original: Yadi tathāgatena vinayapaññattiyā evaṁ bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi tathāgatena vinaya paññattiyā evam bhaṇita

original: ‘ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti tena hi ‘abhiññāyāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi no anabhiññāyā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānaḥ ānanda saṅghaḥ mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatu uti tena hi abhiññāya āha bhikkhave dhammam desemi no an abhiññāya ati tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho sukhumo nipuṇo gambhīro sugambhīro dunnijjhāpayo, so tavānuppatto, tattha te ñāṇabalavipphāraṁ dassehī”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭiko pañhaḥ sukhumaḥ nipuṇaḥ gambhīraḥ sugambhīraḥ dunnijjhāpayaḥ so tava anuppattaḥ tattha te ñāṇa bala vipphāram dassehi iti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā ‘abhiññāyāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi no anabhiññāyā’ti, vinayapaññattiyāpi evaṁ bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: bhāsitam peta mahā rāja bhagavatā abhiññāya āha bhikkhave dhammam desemi no an abhiññāya ati vinaya paññattiyā api evam bhaṇita

original: ‘ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti, taṁ pana, mahārāja, tathāgato bhikkhū vīmaṁsamāno āha—
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānaḥ ānanda saṅghaḥ mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatu uti tam pana mahā rāja tathāgataḥ bhikkhū vīmasamānaḥ āha

original: ‘ukkalessanti nu kho mama sāvakā mayā vissajjāpīyamānā mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni, udāhu ādiyissantī’ti.
analyzed: ukkalessanti nu kho mama sāvakā mayā vissajja āpīyamānāḥ mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni udāhu ādiyissanti iti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, cakkavattī rājā putte evaṁ vadeyya ‘ayaṁ kho, tātā, mahājanapado
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja cakkavattī rājā putte evam vadeyya ayam kho tātā mahā janapadaḥ

original: sabbadisāsu sāgarapariyanto, dukkaro, tātā, tāvatakena balena dhāretuṁ, etha tumhe,
analyzed: sabba disāsu sāgara pariyantaḥ dukkaraḥ tātā tāvatakena balena dhāretu etha tumhe

original: tātā, mamaccayena paccante paccante dese pajahathā’ti.
analyzed: tātā mamaccayena paccante paccante dese pajahatha ati

original: Api nu kho te, mahārāja, kumārā pituaccayena hatthagate janapade sabbe te paccante paccante dese muñceyyun”ti?
analyzed: api nu kho te mahā rāja kumārā pitu accayena hattha gate janapade sabbe te paccante paccante dese muñceyyunti

original: “Na hi, bhante, rājato, bhante, luddhatarā kumārā rajjalobhena taduttariṁ diguṇatiguṇaṁ janapadaṁ pariggaṇheyyuṁ, kiṁ pana te hatthagataṁ janapadaṁ muñceyyun”ti?
analyzed: na hi bhante rājataḥ bhante luddhatarāḥ kumārāḥ rajja lobhena tad uttarim diguṇa tiguṇam janapadam pariggaṇheyyu kim pana te hattha gatam janapadam muñceyyuḥ iti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato bhikkhū vīmaṁsamāno evamāha—
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgataḥ bhikkhū vīmasamānaḥ evam āha

original: ‘ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, saṅgho mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatū’ti.
analyzed: ākaṅkhamānaḥ ānanda saṅghaḥ mamaccayena khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni samūhanatu uti

original: Dukkhaparimuttiyā, mahārāja, buddhaputtā dhammalobhena aññampi uttariṁ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṁ gopeyyuṁ, kiṁ pana pakatipaññattaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ muñceyyun”ti?
analyzed: dukkha parimuttiyāḥ mahā rāja buddha puttāḥ dhamma lobhena aññam pi uttarim diyaḍḍha sikkhāpada satam gopeyyu kim pana pakati paññattam sikkhāpadam muñceyyunti

original: “Bhante nāgasena, yaṁ bhagavā āha—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena yam bhagavān āha

original: ‘khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī’ti, etthāyaṁ jano sammūḷho vimatijāto adhikato saṁsayapakkhando.
analyzed: khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni iti ettha ayam janaḥ sammūḷhaḥ vimati jātaḥ adhikataḥ sa saya pakkhando

original: Katamāni tāni khuddakāni sikkhāpadāni, katamāni anukhuddakāni sikkhāpadānī”ti?
analyzed: katamāni tāni khuddakāni sikkhāpadāni katamāni anukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni iti

original: “Dukkaṭaṁ, mahārāja, khuddakaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ, dubbhāsitaṁ anukhuddakaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ,
analyzed: dukkaṭa mahā rāja khuddakam sikkhāpada dubbhāsitam anukhuddakam sikkhāpada

original: imāni dve khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni, pubbakehipi, mahārāja, mahātherehi ettha
analyzed: imāni dve khudda anukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni pubbakehi pi mahā rāja mahā therehi ettha

original: vimati uppāditā, tehipi ekajjhaṁ na kato dhammasaṇṭhitipariyāye bhagavatā eso pañho upadiṭṭho”ti.
analyzed: vimati uppāditā tehi pi ekajjham na kataḥ dhamma saṇṭhiti pariyāye bhagavatā eso pañho upadiṭṭho ti

original: “Ciranikkhittaṁ, bhante nāgasena, jinarahassaṁ ajjetarahi loke vivaṭaṁ pākaṭaṁ katan”ti.
analyzed: cira nikkhitta bhante nāgasena jina rahassam ajja itarahi loke vivaṭam pākaṭam

original: Khuddānukhuddakapañho paṭhamo.
analyzed: khuddānukhuddaka pañhaḥ paṭhamaḥ
